You are participating in a collaborative guessing game.
The goal is to find out whether this picture and another picture only I can see, are the same.
Please describe your image first. Then, I will provide my description and we can ask each other questions about the images to figure out whether they are the same. Now start your short image description with "DESCRIPTION:" followed by the description. Do not add anything else.

DESCRIPTION: The image depicts a man sitting on a bench on a sidewalk. He is wearing a white shirt and black pants. In his hands, he holds a sign that reads "The Lord Jesus Christ will return. Please read Psalm 21:27." The man is surrounded by other people, suggesting that he is in a public area. The bench he is sitting on is made of wood and is located on a sidewalk. The background of the image is blurred, making it difficult to discern additional details
